text:

text: "Blacktop Wasteland" is a novel about stealing diamonds and driving away. But it's also about race, family, risking everything for others â€” and trying to be the father you wish your father had been, our reviewer says. https://t.co/kFSzSdnxGq

text:
Harry Gruyaert's new photography book "Edges" captures the places where humans interact with our world's natural borders: bodies of water. He's documented this for 44 years â€” unintentionally.
